com.rivelbop.rivelworks.networking

Class Network

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.networking.Network

  • public class Network
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles class registration for clients and servers.
    Author:
    David Jerzak (RivelBop)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String IP
      The network's IP Address ('localhost' by default).
      private static java.lang.String LOG_TAG 
      private int port
      The network's port number (54555 by default).
      private java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Class> REGISTERED_CLASSES
      A set of packet classes registered under the network.

    • Method Detail

      • addClass

        public void addClass(java.lang.Class... classes)
        Adds the provided classes as registered packet data for the network.
        Parameters:
        classes - The packet classes to register.

      • register

        public void register(com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.EndPoint endPoint)
        Registers all the network registered packet classes to the provided EndPoint (Client/Server).
        Parameters:
        endPoint - The point to register the packet classes to.

      • connectClient

        public void connectClient(com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Client client)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Connects the provided client to a server by using all the necessary Network details (IP, Port).
        Parameters:
        client - The client to connect to the Network's server.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Client is unable to connect to the server/network.

      • newClient

        public com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Client newClient(com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Listener listener)
        Creates and returns a new client with the Network data.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to add to the client.
        Returns:
        Client with all Network data (IP, Port, Classes).

      • newServer

        public com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Server newServer(com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Listener listener)
                                              throws java.io.IOException
        Creates, binds, and returns a new server with the Network data.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to add to the server.
        Returns:
        Server with all Network data (IP, Port, Classes).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Server is unable to bind to the Network's IP and Port.

      • setIP

        public void setIP(java.lang.String ip)
        Parameters:
        ip - The new IP address to set the Networks IP to.

      • setPort

        public void setPort(int port)
        Parameters:
        port - The new port to set the Network port to.

      • set

        public void set(java.lang.String ip,
                int port)
        Parameters:
        ip - The new IP address to set the Networks IP to.
        port - The new port to set the Network port to.

      • getIP

        public java.lang.String getIP()
        Returns:
        The Network's stored IP address.

      • getPort

        public int getPort()
        Returns:
        The Network's stored port number.
